title: Die Quarry Proie
description:
" Victim - using the latest and greatest technological advances, you can now enter the game world; a revolution in gaming experience!...."

What does it feel like to be a game character? Why are massacres in the game world considered enjoyable? Amusing? Relaxing? Come and read this short, full-color oneshot by a Singaporean mangaka, Foo Swee Chin, where game creators explore the minds of the game characters by going inside their virtual game.
